Commit Message: Big reorganization of how test methods are run. Now there are a nested set of Links which each handle one aspect of running a method. Custom runners can create their own chain of Links to introduce new behavior. This isn't done--it needs organization like extracting inner classes to top level classes and refinement of visibility.
Refactored Theory runner to make it easier to extend (See StubbedTheoriesTest for one possible extension)
